author: nullmames
content: I gang. Our organisation is learning about running ethereum validators, first at small scale while we developed our tooling and automation and the large scale deployments. Can we please get in contact with some members that may be able to supply us with hoETH for our testing. All tokens will be returned to the appropriate sources following testing after a couple of months. We would love to connect with any other devops folks and become part of the community here. Please feel free to hit us up for a chat.
